content.en: Turbulence prediction: Researchers are exploring the use of machine learning algorithms to improve predictions and simulations of turbulent flow in fluid dynamics. These algorithms, such as neural networks and deep learning models, are being used to enhance the accuracy and stability of Reynolds-averaged Navier-Stokes simulations, as well as to generate realistic turbulent inflow conditions. By incorporating machine learning techniques, scientists hope to overcome the limitations of traditional turbulence models and achieve more precise and reliable results in various applications.
content.da: Turbulensforudsigelse: Forskere undersøger brugen af maskinlæringsalgoritmer for at forbedre forudsigelser og simuleringer af turbulent strømning i fluiddynamik. Disse algoritmer, såsom neurale netværk og dybdelæringsmodeller, anvendes til at øge nøjagtigheden og stabiliteten af Reynolds-gennemsnittede Navier-Stokes simuleringer, samt til at generere realistiske turbulente inflowsforhold. Ved at inkorporere maskinlæringsteknikker håber videnskabsfolk at overvinde begrænsningerne ved traditionelle turbulensmodeller og opnå mere præcise og pålidelige resultater i forskellige applikationer.
